xwikidoc.name: WebHome
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Scripting Documentation
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #if ($xcontext.action == 'get') #if ($request.url && $request.url != '') #set($docContent = $xwiki.getURLContent($request.url)) #set($docContentStart = $docContent.indexOf('')) #set($docContentEnd = $docContent.indexOf('')) #if($docContentStart != -1 && $docContentEnd != -1) #set($ok = $response.setHeader("Cache-Control", 'private')) #set($ok = $response.setHeader("Pragma", 'cache')) #set($expires = $datetool.date.getTime()) #set($expires = $expires+120000)##604800000) #set($expires = $datetool.toDate($expires)) #set($ok = $response.setDateHeader("Expires",$expires.getTime())) #set($ok = $response.setContentType("text/html")) #set($ok = $xcontext.setFinished(true)) #set($ok = $response.getOutputStream().write($docContent.substring($docContentStart, $docContentEnd).getBytes())) #end #else
Select a script binding on your right to get more detailed information.
#end #else $xwiki.ssx.use($doc) {{html}}
{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
